body.name: HQAYW 40 oz Insulated Water Bottle with Straw & 3 Lids, Stainless Steel Metal Water Bottles Double Wall Vacuum Water Flask for Sports, Gym or School, Leak Proof BPA-Free Keep Cold 48H Hot 24H
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 hrs 2 mins
features: Insulated Water Bottle - Experience the ultimate in thermal insulation with our vacuum-sealed water bottle. Featuring double-walled copper-plated technology, it keeps your beverages icy cold for 48 hours or steaming hot for 24 hours. Enjoy every sip at your desired temperature, and say goodbye to lukewarm drinks. Plus, our innovative design prevents condensation, allowing you to confidently stow it in your backpack or travel bag.

Preserving Flavor and Freshness - Our water bottle boasts a premium construction using food-grade 18/8 stainless steel. With a BPA-free lid that ensures no flavor transfer, it preserves the authentic taste of your beverages. Say goodbye to oxidation worries as you indulge in your favorite drinks, whether it's refreshing juices, invigorating coffee, soothing tea, or any other beverage of your choice.

Convenience and Leak-Proof - Designed with your convenience in mind, this water bottle features a slip-resistant silicone ring and a durable coating that offers a secure grip. We provide three different lid styles, each featuring a thick food-grade silicone seal for reliable leak-proof functionality. Whether you're at the gym, hiking in the great outdoors, or enjoying a yoga session, stainless steel water bottle is the perfect companion for your active lifestyle.

Perfect for Any Lifestyle - The versatile water bottle is designed to accompany you throughout your day. Whether you're at home, in the office, or embarking on outdoor adventures like camping or hiking, it's the ideal choice for quenching your thirst. Fill it up with your favorite icy-cold beverages or hot water, and enjoy hydration on the go. Stay refreshed and energized as you conquer your daily routines and adventures.

Thoughtful Gifting and Customer Satisfaction - HQAYW insulated water bottle comes elegantly packaged, making it the perfect gift for your loved ones. Whether it's for back-to-school season, special occasions like Thanksgiving and Christmas, or birthdays, this water bottle is a thoughtful present. If there are any issues with the water bottles, we will provide a full refund or replacement. Your satisfaction is our top priority.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: HQAYW INSULATED WATER BOTTLE Heat and love, hand in glove.

Double Vacuum Water Bottles Keep Cold Hot This water bottle uses double-walled vacuum copper-plated insulation to keep your beverages ice-cold or hot for long time. Flavor Preservation and Food-Grade Materials Embrace a healthier lifestyle with the food-grade 18/8 stainless steel body and BPA-free lid of our water bottle.

Enjoy a refreshing drink on the field Stay cool at the field with the HQAYW insulated water bottle. Keep your drinks refreshingly chilled. Enjoy precious moments with your family Let the insulated water bottle be your trusted companion during cherished family gatherings. Stay hydrated and energized every day Our stainless steel water bottle is designed to meet your daily hydration needs for a full day of work. Unforgettable travel experiences Experience the delight of savoring hot coffee throughout your travel adventures, as our water bottle keeps it perfectly warm along the way. Life means movement and exercise After your workout or exercise, it's important to replenish your body with fluids. If you also enjoy camping HQAYW metal water bottles can allow you to enjoy a steaming hot cup of coffee when you wake up in the morning.
Thoughtful gifts for the back-to-school season, Thanksgiving or Christmas

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this bottle! I use it everyday! Super easy to clean holds plenty of water and stays cold all day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, effective hydration source.
reviews.reviewText: I give most of my water sources an absolute beating due to my military occupation, and this bottle has handled the thrashings a lot better than previous bottles. I generally use the clip-on top, and after the clip broke I found the hook to be even more useful without the clip getting in the way for hanging it from my belt loop. Water inside stays cold for as long as the water lasts in the bottle, but the longest I've had water in it was overnight about 12 hours. The exterior of the bottle definitely shows it's wear from many drops and bangs, but hasn't broken as many others have at the cap. For the price, this is one of the best investments you can make!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great water bottle
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this water bottle! Bought it as a christmas gift and was very surprised that it came with different lids to use. Will definitely buy another one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The insulated is as described had to buy a 2nd one

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love everything about this water bottle , it’s a great size for what you need and keeps your drinks cold for 48 hours! Which I find better than the 24 hours most bottles have to keep your drinks cold , it also has pretty nice colors between the 4 available bottles , I definitely recommend this bottle!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Keeps water cold all day, comes with three different lids that all work well. Very good bottle for the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It was perfect!
reviews.reviewText: I needed a large bottle and this was looked like what I needed. When it got here, it was exactly what I needed and the multiple lids were a huge bonus! It even had a tool to clean the straw. I love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This goes with me everywhere I go. I use the sport lid, it's completely leak proof & keeps cold for at least 24 hours
